title: Rimmer Type Foundry
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225346/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225346/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Rimmer Type Foundry**

A subsidiary of [P22 Type Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225346/http:/typophile.com/wiki/P22), The Rimmer Type Foundry offers the collective digital works of Canadian National Treasure, [Jim Rimmer](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225346/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jim%20Rimmer).

For More Information, see [The Official Press Release](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225346/http:/typophile.com/node/17056).
author: paul d hunt
